title: Death of the Minotaur
medium: etching and aquatint on Arches paper
credit_line: Gift of Mrs. James H. Beal
provenance_text:
Benton Murdoch Spruance [1904-1967], Philadelphia, PA. Mrs. James H. Beal (born Rebecca Huebley Jones) [1898-1993], Pittsburgh, PA, probably 1953 until April 11, 1957 [1]; gift to Department of Fine Arts, Carnegie Institute, Pittsburgh, PA, April 1957 [2].

Notes:
[1]. Possibly a gift from the artist, as per inscription on lower right "for Becky."
[2]. The etching was accessioned on April 11, 1957.
